author: rhuijben
msg: Optionally provide information about the ra layer we are testing to the C
tests. This will (after a few followup patches) allow running several
C tests against svn:// and http://.

author: jfthomps
msg: VCL-776 - rework resource code to have a base class for all resources and inheriting classes for each resource type

image.php: modified AJeditResource: decode html special characters for image description and usage notes before sending response; the textarea dijit widget does not need the strings html escaped, and leaving them escaped resulted in & repeatedly being converted to &
